channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned plastic barriers on Allerton Rd, 28th November
item.description:
The street barriers were left I think after filming took place on the street some months ago. They are beside the bike hanger outside no. 59

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Allerton Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Broken Concrete in Road, 28th November
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned car Casby house car park, 28th November
item.description:
This car has been dumped at the Casby house car park for nearly a year now. Taking up valuable parking space and collecting tickets that will most likely never be paid off.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marine Street, Bermondsey, Greater London

item.title: House 3-5 Brosse Way, 28th November
item.description:
None of the lampposts have been working, unfortunately this has been raised by my neighbours but they couldn’t seem to get a response. It’s been around 5 years now, that these haven’t been working. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brosse Way, Bromley Common, Greater London

item.title: Pavement damage, 28th November
item.description:
Continue down Groombridge Close, turn right onto Tyrell Avenue, Huge uneven flooring with multiple trip hazards on left hand side pavement on Tyrell avenue. Difficult to see in the dark, trip hazard as well as risk of serious injury due to the sharp angles of lifted up pavement. Looks even bigger/worse than the photo implies. Believed to be caused by roadworks lorry tyre a few weeks ago

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tyrrell Avenue, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two chairs dumped on grass verge, 28th November
item.description:
The two chairs that are on the grass verge were dumped by the green car in the picture. When asked why they was dumping the chairs they said they had no space in the car for everyone after pick up and they were coming back with a van they haven’t returned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickhurst Lane, Hayes, Greater London
